name: Avocado
headline: Fully Integrated Restaurant Point-of-Sale
description: Our mission is to support entrepreneurs in the food industry by offering a seamlessly integrated restaurant tech platform. We handle all forms of customer payments, both in person and online, including kiosk and invoicing. Additionally, we manage critical back-office tasks, including order management, payroll, bookkeeping, and sales tax remittance, so that restaurants and their teams can prioritize delivering exceptional dining experiences.

founders.name: Nick Evans, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder and CEO of Avocado
Co-Founder and first CEO of Tile
Former hardware and software engineer
Love products and people
Austin, TX -> SF, CA

# A fresh take on a point of sale
###### The modern platform to power your food truck, coffee shop, or restaurant

## What makes us different
## ðŸ¤‘
### You Save a Ton
#### Free Hardware, Free Setup, Free Service, No Merchant Fees
Whether you're a small food truck or a large chain, you're going to save lots.
## ðŸ˜„
### Unreal Customer Support
#### We answer immediately. No joke. Try us. Call or text:
[](https://avocadopos.com/<tel:>)
No more waiting on hold. We are always available.
## âœ¨
### AI Superpowers
#### Features straight out of science fiction
Avocado AI powers your order taking, reporting, team management, loyalty, marketing, and much more. You won't believe what is possible.
## Core System Overview
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pHMojc8zC1BWW9Z3zztKdOrbQ.jpeg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pHMojc8zC1BWW9Z3zztKdOrbQ.jpeg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/2r4xhjcDa1mqC6N5lzs6zml33Y.jpeg)
# POS (Point of Sale)
### POS (Point of Sale)
## Your team's main workstation. A design so easy to use it requires no training.
## Your team's main workstation. A design so easy to use it requires no training.

# KDS (Kitchen Display System)
### KDS (Kitchen Display System)
# KDS (Kitchen Display System)
## Streamline your kitchen displaying onsite and pickup orders.
## Streamline your kitchen displaying onsite and pickup orders.
[Learn More](https://avocadopos.com/<https:/form.typeform.com/to/KQyuWsEZ>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/0SFOJll0N8k8nOxpAXQcTgWlUIo.jpeg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FyrIdIXzR8R8RSAR3OB33ries.jpeg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FyrIdIXzR8R8RSAR3OB33ries.jpeg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/yxV4TnCTBQHA5G0bJ0PsDgy528s.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/yxV4TnCTBQHA5G0bJ0PsDgy528s.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/yxV4TnCTBQHA5G0bJ0PsDgy528s.png)
#### Handheld POS
For table-side ordering and payments. Make your table service operations blazing fast.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/DOA9YZsQTm7gKRgFKrtxol4Y0Hk.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/DOA9YZsQTm7gKRgFKrtxol4Y0Hk.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/DOA9YZsQTm7gKRgFKrtxol4Y0Hk.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/HbqJuu9o55OBX8yeIO9JAGMd6A.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/HbqJuu9o55OBX8yeIO9JAGMd6A.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/HbqJuu9o55OBX8yeIO9JAGMd6A.png)
#### QR Code Ordering
Integrated mobile ordering so your guests can order pickup or at the table with a QR code.
#### Ticket Printer
USB, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, or Ethernet Printer. A ticket printer for every setup.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/SE55zgfXCZc8De2xoQyjctTaO8.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/SE55zgfXCZc8De2xoQyjctTaO8.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/1kZrAH7hhoOeJSKeI25fmiCku9M.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/1kZrAH7hhoOeJSKeI25fmiCku9M.png)
####  Order Notifications
No more shouting names with easy text notifications when orders are ready.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/b033hpORRivJERXcXUVR05OJHM.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/b033hpORRivJERXcXUVR05OJHM.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/b033hpORRivJERXcXUVR05OJHM.png)
#### Built-In Customer Feedback
Know when things are going right and catch the negative feedback before it goes to Yelp.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/GlvfkqIIoO55gAg4RtDHbPVrqQ.png)
#### Gift Cards
Physical and digital gift cards that can be texted or emailed to customers.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/mXbqWzFwJOay4ikijTsWddUuiIo.png)
#### Apple Pay and Google Pay Ready
Accept payments with just a tap.
## Sound too good to be true?

## Ok, here's your billâ€¦
## Ok, here's your billâ€¦
## Ok, here's your billâ€¦
### No hidden charges.No upselling to premium packages.Everything is included for free.Just bring your own Apple-based hardware, or you can purchase hardware at a discounted rate directly through us.
### We're able to keep everything free for you by charging your customer 2.5% of the order total at checkout.Your customers also pay the credit card fee, so no more merchant fees for you.
### What? How is this possible?
### We're able to keep everything free for you by charging your customer 2.4% of the order total plus the credit card fee at checkout.You keep everything without an additional merchant fee. You sell a burger for $10, you get $10.
### We're able to keep everything free for you by charging your customer 2.5% of the order total at checkout.Your customers also pay the credit card fee, so no more merchant fees for you.

generated_description:
### Avocado: A Fresh Take on Restaurant Point-of-Sale Systems

**Overview**
Founded in 2020 and hailing from Austin, TX, Avocado is revolutionizing the way restaurants manage their operations. As part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, this lean team of four is on a mission to create a fully integrated restaurant point-of-sale (POS) system that effortlessly handles every aspect of a dining establishment's needs, from customer payments to back-office management.

**Mission**
Avocadoâ€™s mission is simple yet powerful: to support food industry entrepreneurs by providing a seamless tech platform. This encompasses managing in-person and online payments, including kiosks and invoicing, while simplifying tasks like order management, payroll, bookkeeping, and sales tax remittance. The goal? Allow restaurant teams to focus on what really mattersâ€”delivering great dining experiences.

**Key Features**
1. **Cost Savings**: Avocado stands out by offering free hardware, setup, and service, along with no merchant fees. This is a game-changer, especially for smaller food trucks and independently-owned eateries.
  
2. **Exceptional Customer Support**: With a promise of immediate response times, Avocado prides itself on making customer support a top priority. Forget being put on hold; their team is always available to assist.

3. **AI Superpowers**: Their integrated AI capabilities bring advanced features for order taking, reporting, team management, loyalty programs, and marketing, pushing the envelope on what restaurant tech can do. 

4. **User-Friendly Design**: The platform is intuitive to the point that training is no longer necessary, allowing for quick adoption by staff.

5. **Financial Model**: Avocado employs a unique pricing structure that charges customers a 2.5% fee at checkout, taking away the burden of merchant fees from restaurant owners.

**Why Choose Avocado?**
Avocado's innovative approach allows small to mid-sized restaurants to eliminate hidden charges and upsells that often plague traditional POS systems. You get everything included for free or at heavily discounted rates. Customers report that Avocadoâ€™s system is not only functional and financially prudent but also fun to use.

**Customer Testimonials**
Restaurant owners have shared glowing reviews about Avocadoâ€™s platform, highlighting things like ease of operation, the quality of customer service, and the absence of hefty fees that typically accompany other POS systems. From food trucks to established restaurants, users appreciate the streamlined processes Avocado promotes.

In essence, Avocado is more than just a POS system; itâ€™s a partner for any restaurant looking to harness technology for better service and smoother operations. If youâ€™re in the food business and want a solution that really caters to your needs, Avocado is worth a good look.

**Find Out More**
To dive deeper or schedule a demo, visit Avocado's website: [Avocado POS](https://avocadopos.com).
